meanings.definition: A person who attends the same school as another.
meanings.sent1: My schoolmate and I walk to school together every morning.
meanings.sent2: I have a lot of fun playing with my schoolmate during recess.
meanings.sent3: My schoolmate always forgets their lunch, it's quite funny!
meanings.sent4: Being a schoolmate is like having a built-in friend at school.
meanings.sent5: I remember my schoolmate's name by thinking of them as my school buddy.

meanings.sent1: During the group project, my schoolmate helped me with the research.
meanings.sent2: My schoolmate and I sit next to each other in math class.
meanings.sent3: My schoolmate is so quiet in class, it's almost like they're a ninja!
meanings.sent4: In the sea of students, my schoolmate's presence always stands out.
meanings.sent5: I always share my snacks with my schoolmate during lunchtime.
